text: Sporadic Movements is the first EP released by The Contortionist, who were known as "At the Hands of Machines" at the time. The EP has a deathcore sound instead of the progressive metal influenced- sound heard on later releases. == Track listing == ==Personnel== * Jake Morris – vocals * Robby Baca – guitar * Cameron Manyard – guitar * Christopher Tilley – bass * Joey Baca – drums Category:2007 debut EPs Category:The Contortionist albums
title: Sporadic Movements (EP)
